title.skin:query: SELECT title_id as ID, title as Name, RTRIM(Type) as Type, Price, Notes, PubDate as PublicationDate FROM titles info WHERE title_id = @id FOR XML AUTO, ELEMENTS

authors.skin:query: SELECT au_id as ID, au_lname as LastName, au_fname as FirstName FROM authors author WHERE au_id IN (SELECT au_id FROM titleauthor WHERE title_id = @id) FOR XML AUTO

title.skin:query: SELECT pub_id as ID, pub_name as Name FROM publishers publisher WHERE pub_id IN (SELECT pub_id FROM titles WHERE title_id = @id) FOR XML AUTO
